artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Kawaguchiya Shōzō
catalogue_raissonne: Ukiyo-e shūka 14 (1981), Hiroshige list, p. 240, chūtanzaku #08.2
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription:
waka:When Autumn wind blow through pine trees, what made me is the sound of pounding silk in the village by the jewel river.
Japanese: Matsu kaze no fuki taru aki zo sabishiki wa, kinu utsu oto zo tamagawa no sato
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From The Six Jewel Rivers (Mu Tamagawa no uchi 六玉川之内)
title: The Kinuta Jewel River in Settsu Province
